bibl.title: New Texts in the Economy of Tebtunis
bibl.note: P. Tebt. Wall 1-12. Diss. Duke Univ. Summary in DA 44 (1983-1984) pp. 1442-1443-A. - Twelve texts (Ist and IInd c. A.D.), previously unpublished or partly published. Nine are money market transactions, three are real estate transactions. Analysis of the money market in the village (loans and deposits).
bibl.seg: Wall Elbert Walker, New Texts in the Economy of Tebtunis.

P. Tebt. Wall 1-12. Diss. Duke Univ. Summary in DA 44 (1983-1984) pp. 1442-1443-A. - Twelve texts (Ist and IInd c. A.D.), previously unpublished or partly published. Nine are money market transactions, three are real estate transactions. Analysis of the money market in the village (loans and deposits).
